title: Whoa, the category is empty!
content: Where did all the old Blackletter Special Interest Group threads go?
author: dan_reynolds

comments.content:
Oh, they got mixed in with the [Blackletter/Uncial Critique Forum](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145340/http:/typophile.com/rss/critique/blackletter). Why? If so, why keep this category?

\_\_  
 [www.typeoff.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317145340/http:/www.typeoff.de/ "www.typeoff.de")
Dammit, not all Blackletter threads are new design critiques. Rrrr... looking into this...
